recommendations: Not appearing for "pizza near me", "pizza", "best pizza Arlington", "pizza delivery near me", "pizza Arlington Virginia", "top pizza Arlington", "pizza restaurant near me", "pizza food Arlington" - optimize Google My Business profile with these keywords

reviews.text:
The service was good. The older gentleman at the front was very friendly. Pizza was delicious, not cheap with the cheese, which I appreciated. Highly recommend.
The wings, on the other hand, seemed to be rushed, so they were a bit burned outside and a but undercooked inside, which gave them a weird burt nasty flavor. Not recommended. Price was not too bad, but I could not eat the wings, so that was a waste. Would eat here again but not get wings for sure.

I want to start my review with saying that I have not actually been to Pizza Pie Me, I've only ordered  delivery so I can't comment on the atmosphere of the resturant. I thought that the delivery time was good considering that I ordered at 7PM on a Saturday, when I called and ordered they told me 50 to 55 minutes(which is about what I expected) the delivery driver arrived in about 35 minutes. What I ordered was basically an order of the Chicken Tenders and a Calzone. The chicken tenders were a decent size,  cooked perfectly, moist and had a good crunch with a coating that didn't over power the chicken itself, I would suspect that they were made in house. The Calzone was not only large(the box in the photo is 12 inches square)but very good as well. Crust was soft but firm enough to hold up to the ingreadients. Fillings were flavorful and a good quality. The only negative criticism I have about Pizza Pie Me is that I wanted to replace the red sauce in my Calzone with ranch to basically create a Chicken Bacon Ranch calzone but they wouldn't do it so I ordered light on the tomato sauce and it came out very good, but not exactly what I wanted. I suspect the reason they wouldn't replace tomato sauce with Ranch is because they probably don't have Ranch in bulk, I didn't see any Ranch options for pizza or calzones and when I got Ranch for my Tenders it was in pre-made Ken's cups. Over all I thought that the food was good delivery time was good and the ordering experience was good, I will definatly order again if in the area again.

My family and I are in town visiting from Detroit and WOW! We were BLOWN AWAY by this delicious Italian. We ordered several items and everything was amazing. Literally the BEST calzone I‚Äôve ever eaten. The service was prompt and the restaurant had a very ‚Äúhomie‚Äù feel. Thank you so much for the amazing food and experience.

Shady little pizza place but the food is AMAZING. Get the turkey sandwich it has pesto on it. The bread is delicious! Delivery drive was friendly and when I went in for pick up everyone was nice. Can‚Äôt speak to the pizza. Salads were good too!
We have been here a couple times. It is takeout only. Pizza is really good. They make it pretty quick. Prices are reasonable. They are very friendly. I would definitely recommend this place.

recentReviews.text: I discovered Pizza Pie Me a few months ago, and it's now my favorite pizza place. Delicious pies, really fresh ingredients, and fast service.

Never been to that area so it looked sketchy at first. The place is not truly a sit-down kind of place so we ordered to go. We tried their Italiano pie and it was dioicous. The lady behind the counter was very friendly and quite honestly the price wasn't bad. Pleasantly surprised.
The lady who runs this place is so sweet üòã

Visiting Arlington for the first time and wasn't sure what was all around or good. I found Pizza Pie Me and thought, why not? It was a quick delivery and the food is phenomenal! Good fresh and quality food.1000% would recommend.

I usually never post reviews, but their actions made me. They are such cheap people - We bought food and asked for 3 paper plates and napkins and they charged $3 for that‚Ä¶ never heard of that in my life since it‚Äôs usually given complementary. Do not recommended going - they are so many places nearby that are better. Food wasn‚Äôt worth the $$ either
On our visit to Arlington this was a fast and convenient place to grab a pizza for the family.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Wigginton
detailedReviews.text: I discovered Pizza Pie Me a few months ago, and it's now my favorite pizza place. Delicious pies, really fresh ingredients, and fast service.

detailedReviews.author: Eliezer Martinez
detailedReviews.text: Never been to that area so it looked sketchy at first. The place is not truly a sit-down kind of place so we ordered to go. We tried their Italiano pie and it was dioicous. The lady behind the counter was very friendly and quite honestly the price wasn't bad. Pleasantly surprised.

detailedReviews.author: Heather Horon
detailedReviews.text: The lady who runs this place is so sweet üòã

detailedReviews.author: Morgan Hyler
detailedReviews.text: Visiting Arlington for the first time and wasn't sure what was all around or good. I found Pizza Pie Me and thought, why not? It was a quick delivery and the food is phenomenal! Good fresh and quality food.1000% would recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Lahar Parikh
detailedReviews.text: I usually never post reviews, but their actions made me. They are such cheap people - We bought food and asked for 3 paper plates and napkins and they charged $3 for that‚Ä¶ never heard of that in my life since it‚Äôs usually given complementary. Do not recommended going - they are so many places nearby that are better. Food wasn‚Äôt worth the $$ either

detailedReviews.author: Bryony Grealish
detailedReviews.text: On our visit to Arlington this was a fast and convenient place to grab a pizza for the family.

detailedReviews.author: Steven Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Tasty food, great prices

detailedReviews.author: Zuri Johnson
detailedReviews.text: I called 2 times they don‚Äôt answer

detailedReviews.author: Damien Fury
detailedReviews.text: Pizza Pie Me is our go to Pizza spot in Arlington. This shop has great food for unbeatable prices. The service is excellent as well and the staff make you feel at home.

detailedReviews.author: Blackberry Sage
detailedReviews.text: I love, love, love this place. I get the Italiano pizza most often. It‚Äôs delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Noel Seeley
detailedReviews.text: I want to start my review with saying that I have not actually been to Pizza Pie Me, I've only ordered  delivery so I can't comment on the atmosphere of the resturant. I thought that the delivery time was good considering that I ordered at 7PM on a Saturday, when I called and ordered they told me 50 to 55 minutes(which is about what I expected) the delivery driver arrived in about 35 minutes. What I ordered was basically an order of the Chicken Tenders and a Calzone. The chicken tenders were a decent size,  cooked perfectly, moist and had a good crunch with a coating that didn't over power the chicken itself, I would suspect that they were made in house. The Calzone was not only large(the box in the photo is 12 inches square)but very good as well. Crust was soft but firm enough to hold up to the ingreadients. Fillings were flavorful and a good quality. The only negative criticism I have about Pizza Pie Me is that I wanted to replace the red sauce in my Calzone with ranch to basically create a Chicken Bacon Ranch calzone but they wouldn't do it so I ordered light on the tomato sauce and it came out very good, but not exactly what I wanted. I suspect the reason they wouldn't replace tomato sauce with Ranch is because they probably don't have Ranch in bulk, I didn't see any Ranch options for pizza or calzones and when I got Ranch for my Tenders it was in pre-made Ken's cups. Over all I thought that the food was good delivery time was good and the ordering experience was good, I will definatly order again if in the area again.

detailedReviews.author: Marshall Wassel
detailedReviews.text: Never had a bad pizza from there. Delivery is quick and always get my order right. Even the special instructions.

detailedReviews.author: Alfonso S.
detailedReviews.text:
The service was good. The older gentleman at the front was very friendly. Pizza was delicious, not cheap with the cheese, which I appreciated. Highly recommend.
The wings, on the other hand, seemed to be rushed, so they were a bit burned outside and a but undercooked inside, which gave them a weird burt nasty flavor. Not recommended. Price was not too bad, but I could not eat the wings, so that was a waste. Would eat here again but not get wings for sure.

detailedReviews.author: Serena Buday
detailedReviews.text: Shady little pizza place but the food is AMAZING. Get the turkey sandwich it has pesto on it. The bread is delicious! Delivery drive was friendly and when I went in for pick up everyone was nice. Can‚Äôt speak to the pizza. Salads were good too!

detailedReviews.author: Talmage Kelley
detailedReviews.text: My family and I are in town visiting from Detroit and WOW! We were BLOWN AWAY by this delicious Italian. We ordered several items and everything was amazing. Literally the BEST calzone I‚Äôve ever eaten. The service was prompt and the restaurant had a very ‚Äúhomie‚Äù feel. Thank you so much for the amazing food and experience.

detailedReviews.author: Casey Jewett
detailedReviews.text: Ordered via DoorDash. Came hot and was delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Joni Guerrero
detailedReviews.text: So many things went wrong with my order... 1) I ordered a carry-out special 2-topping pizza with pepperoni and jalapenos. They gave me a pizza with just jalapenos and say I ordered "pizza and jalapenos" which doesn't make sense if I picked 2-toppings and it's on the receipt... 2) crazy enough they added the stem of the jalapenos into the pizza.... Is no one paying attention? 3) the customer service is atrocious when I tried to call about the issue, some guy was giving me an attitude and blaming me 4) To top it off, the pizza is tiny (ordered a large) and was ehhhh on taste. The wings are also tiny!!! I forgot to take photos but other customers have taken photos and they are so small with barely any sauce on them

detailedReviews.author: Tyler F
detailedReviews.text: I love ordering from this place. Their two single specials is the reason I order from them. It‚Äôs perfect every time and exactly what need every time. Thank you Pizza Pie.

detailedReviews.author: Regina Payton
detailedReviews.text: Pizza by the slice pretty good, slices not as big a NY slices.  Customer Service is prompt and courteous, Reasonable prices.Take out only.  I would go back to try other menu items as well.

detailedReviews.author: Christian Valentin
detailedReviews.text: Great Pizza And Wings A++++++ Staff

detailedReviews.author: Kristin Hill
detailedReviews.text: Ordered delivery to our hotel while visiting Dc with family. Came quick and hot and was very good! We got the 2 1-topping deal. Husband had pepperoni and I got chicken pesto. Loved that we could choose toppings AND sauce!

detailedReviews.author: Ricky Deras
detailedReviews.text: The pizzas are good and sandwiches here are very well sized. It would have 5 stars but the lady at the counter charged me twice for my food and said I hadn‚Äôt paid online.

detailedReviews.author: Richard Hutchinson
detailedReviews.text: Ordered and the delivery said 40 min. It was deliverd to the wrong place. Didn't get it till 1 1/2 hours. They did not even to give a discount on the product. I will not be ordering from them again.

detailedReviews.author: Jo Jo Lee
detailedReviews.text: I've been ordering from here for 5 years and absolutely love this cute pizza place. I order at least twice a month...pastas, pizza, calzones, sandwiches, baked fries, mozzarella sticks, pita bread, breadstickd, cheesybread. They handmake from scratch nearly everything. They got me through the pandemic and some depressing times. Excellent food quality, super fair prices given it is Shirlington, large portions that takes me days to finish. I haven't really gained weight eating like this either (I think its the good ingredients and how easy it is to save leftovers and reheat). I don't want to imagine my neighborhood without PPM! Everyone I told about this place is obsessed. Once in awhile I'll go in to pickup instead of UberEats and the staff are so nice. They tend to run some nice deals on UberEats too. Support support support!

detailedReviews.author: Angelique Opstelten
detailedReviews.text: We ordered 2 sandwiches: turkey and ham. In both, the meat was so hard and dry it reminded us of some kind of jerky.

detailedReviews.author: Nate B
detailedReviews.text: We have been here a couple times. It is takeout only. Pizza is really good. They make it pretty quick. Prices are reasonable. They are very friendly. I would definitely recommend this place.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Milligan
detailedReviews.text: The tuscan pizza and steak sandwich were very very good. Looking at the reviews, it seems this place is polarizing - well, I'm on the "love it" side.

detailedReviews.author: Scott Cohen
detailedReviews.text: Bad service.  Don‚Äôt bother placing a delivery order.  They will get it WRONG

detailedReviews.author: Nauman Funyas
detailedReviews.text: Get the wings and the pizza

detailedReviews.author: Tiarnna Hamilton-Sanchez
detailedReviews.text: No where to really dine in it‚Äôs strictly carry out and delivery. Food is wonderful though.

detailedReviews.author: Mykala McShea
detailedReviews.text: The only pizza in the area that actually looks and tastes like NY style pizza! If you‚Äôve been to the east coast like me, you know that the other pizzerias around DC trying to capturing NY pizza just can‚Äôt get it‚ÄîPizza Pie Me gets it!! üòäüçïThe staff are also always very friendly!

detailedReviews.author: Ike Toms
detailedReviews.text: I was about to order and I see so many bad reviews so I'll past ...get it together

detailedReviews.author: John Bar
detailedReviews.text: Bad customer service .

detailedReviews.author: D Cary (DMC)
detailedReviews.text:
I ordered at 09:36pm. I ordered 1 medium peperoni and black olive pizza made with large dough so its thicker like a pan. Its exactly how I order everywhere. Paid $21.49 + $10 driver tip.

Just got my pizza at 11:52pm after making multiple calls. Its cold and not what i ordered. I called back and was told to call tomorrow to ask the owner for a refund. I will edit this tomorrow...

Edit to owner: I never got a call or refund. I dont care that I was promised a pan and did not get it. I care that my pizza had 5 pepperoni, was over cooked, dry, cold, had the wrong olive type and took a long time to arrive.

detailedReviews.author: Joao Pereira
detailedReviews.text: Once upon a time they had the best, largest wings in the area.  Now it is all about making money and providing a less than average product. Look at these things? Are they worth over $1 each? NO! Paid $80 for 40 of these nuggets? damn we regret it. Dominos has better wings. You guys have gone CHEAP and BAD. Barely any sauce on there too. I will never again order from here and will never recommend them again!

detailedReviews.author: Jorge Menendez
detailedReviews.text: Ordered a meatball calzone at 10:30pm on a Wednesday. One of the best I have ever had, fresh and tasty crust and the meatball was done to perfection. This is more of a take out place, but they make a pretty mean Calazoneüòã

detailedReviews.author: Corey Nick
detailedReviews.text: Exceptional customer service. Enjoyed my experience and the pizza was the best I‚Äôve had in Arlington.

detailedReviews.author: William Godfrey
detailedReviews.text:
Do NOT order from this place. They sent me the completely wrong pizza order. Not only was the order wrong, it arrived late. On top of all that, the order had a topping on it that I‚Äôm allergic to. Spent 20 minutes on the phone trying to get it figured out, and still don‚Äôt have the right order. If it were possible to give zero stars, I would. Terrible experience with this pizza place.

UPDATE: I ordered from Pizza Pie Me again a few weeks later thinking that my horrible experience with them the first time might have been an outlier. It was not. Their service was still awful. A full hour after placing my order, it still was not ready for the delivery guy to pick it up to deliver it. In addition, they had not even started working on making the pizza. An hour after the order was placed. This place is HORRIBLE. They are incompetent, slow, rude, and have terrible customer service. Avoid it all costs.

detailedReviews.author: Abigail Cummins
detailedReviews.text: I could not rate this place any better. The pizza is absolutely fantastic, I‚Äôve never had better. The woman in front taking my order was also great, you can tell she really cares for the shop and the customers. Unfortunately they are 50 mins away from me so I can‚Äôt get delivery, but I‚Äôm more than happy to drive and get it. (That‚Äôs saying something with how much it sucks to drive in this state üòÇ)

detailedReviews.author: Karen Archer
detailedReviews.text: Staff is always very pleasant and helpful. Food is delicious.

detailedReviews.author: K W
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was just OKüòè

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Ladd
detailedReviews.text: Food is delicious! Nothing disappointed. Small place not really a sit down restaurant. But we‚Äôll worth the trip there and the price.

detailedReviews.author: Mohanad Alsaid
detailedReviews.text: Last month, I ordered a pizza from this restaurant and provided my credit card information. Recently, my debit card was used by someone from the restaurant. When I called to address the issue, they refused to connect me with their supervisor. Be cautious when ordering from here.

detailedReviews.author: Rosie H
detailedReviews.text: This is our favorite late night pizza place to order from! They‚Äôre open late as well. We usually get our usual pepperoni with green peppers and it‚Äôs one of those pizzas that you actually want to eat the whole slice. I don‚Äôt usually like crusts but their crusts are delicious!

detailedReviews.author: George
detailedReviews.text: I'm assuming I met the owner when I popped in. Pizza is delish! And she hooked me up.

detailedReviews.author: Tomathis Gaming
detailedReviews.text: Very nice little place, good food and friendly people. The price is very fair.

detailedReviews.author: Tammy Fowler
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza I have ever had!

detailedReviews.author: marc cormier
detailedReviews.text: Tr√®s bonne cuisine pour un prix raisonnable

detailedReviews.author: Anas
detailedReviews.text: Great service.

detailedReviews.author: Alicia Lewis
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs always amazing on pizza night! I‚Äôm always greeted with a smile and there‚Äôs always consistency with the taste and presentation.

detailedReviews.author: Stephanie Huffstetler
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza we've ever had! The service and people were absolutely amazing. So nice, and so glad we found this place!

detailedReviews.author: Chris Johnson
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza I have had in my 30 years. It's beat any place in NYC or Chicago

detailedReviews.author: Kaden Randlett
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and breadsticks!

detailedReviews.author: J√ºrgen Hochk√∂ppler
detailedReviews.text: Great! Go there, of you ever pass by.

detailedReviews.author: dominique nichole
detailedReviews.text: Umm. Just moved to the area. Just wanted hangover pizza. I ordered online had it delivered. Didn‚Äôt hear anything from them for over an hour. I called them 6 times. No answer. Then they call and say they are here. The pizza they gave me was the wrong pizza and it was cold. I live 6min from them. I didn‚Äôt order a pizza with mushrooms on it. I hate mushrooms so now the pizza is in the trash can and I‚Äôm still hungry an hour and a half later. Never ordering again.

detailedReviews.author: Aiden Collins
detailedReviews.text: Took long fur delivery and pizza wasn‚Äôt too good

detailedReviews.author: Paige Settles
detailedReviews.text: I love their meatball sandwich. Pizza is average but I‚Äôd definitely still order it. Delivery is usually fast!

detailedReviews.author: Hannah Lincoln
detailedReviews.text: Not authentic Italian by any stretch of the imagination, or even Italian-American. Nice people and I feel bad writing this but‚Ä¶it was really not good food.

detailedReviews.author: Charles Hawkins
detailedReviews.text: Delicious pizza

detailedReviews.author: Ebony Ebz
detailedReviews.text: Always good and tasty, it‚Äôs my once in awhile, end of the week treat and I haven‚Äôt been disappointed yet! The sauce is great!

detailedReviews.author: Cathy Chumley
detailedReviews.text: Best Pizza in Arlington by far!! A "slice" of pizza = 2 large slices. Great price, under $4!!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Emma
detailedReviews.text: Really great pizza, pasta, and entrees come with bread. We ordered delivery on Slice and we‚Äôre really happy.

detailedReviews.author: Riley McLaughlin
detailedReviews.text: This may be the worst pizza shop in all of Arlington. The fries aren‚Äôt even fried, you could bake fries in the oven better than the fries they sold me for 6.99 with ken‚Äôs steakhouse ranch (+1$). The mozz sticks, had better at Applebees. Again, I could get the TGIF frozen mozz sticks at the local giant and they‚Äôd taste better than this. And the calzone, gross, how‚Äôs this place called the calzone zone? Should be called no calzone zone. 1 star!

detailedReviews.author: Myesha newman
detailedReviews.text: It‚Äôs always amazing on pizza night! I‚Äôm always greeted with a smile and there‚Äôs always consistency with the taste and presentation. My family and I LOVE getting our pizza here and there are probably 20 other pizza spots surrounding our home but this is our favorite one.

detailedReviews.author: Faisal
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a ground beef and green pepper pizza last night along with an order of mozzarella sticks. While the mozzarella sticks were tasty, the pizza was extremely salty and almost inedible. I only ate two slices then disposed of the rest. Quite disappointed as this was my first time ordering from Pizza Pie Me after seeing many encouraging reviews.

detailedReviews.author: Selamawi Mesfin
detailedReviews.text: This has always been superior! Any food on the menu will leave you coming back for more and more

detailedReviews.author: Morgan Wood
detailedReviews.text: The food was way yummy! The service was great! The portions are very substantial and the marinara sauce delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Meredith Taaffe
detailedReviews.text: Just simply Amazing the pizza has homemade dough and the other food on the menu is phenomenal. I highly recommend to anyone in the Arlington Area ontop of it all the staff is very üëè.

detailedReviews.author: Rachel Gillispie
detailedReviews.text: As always & expected; fabulous!!! Pizza Pie Me has become my household's SOLE pizza delivery & carryout pizza joint. The taste of the food is satisfying and the food is also pleasing to the eye. The staff are courteous and friendly. In my opinion; they are one of the better things about living in South Arlington b/c Pizza Pie Me has integrated itself into the community. Ordering from them feels like ordering from friends.

detailedReviews.author: Alva Needham
detailedReviews.text: Great calzones and customer service!

detailedReviews.author: Ekhtear Tamanna
detailedReviews.text: Very bad delivery service.

detailedReviews.author: Mason Fiedler
detailedReviews.text: honestly one of my favorite pizza places. the consistency in quality is what keeps me ordering from them. Sauce is on the sweeter side, but that is one of the reasons I love ordering from here.

detailedReviews.author: Eugene Kam
detailedReviews.text:
By far the worst pizza I have ever had in any state or province.  This is pretty much just crust with a bit sprinkled on it. The crust is also ridiculously thick. Most slices were not cut properly, can‚Äôt really blame them though, I couldn‚Äôt cut through something so thick either. The caramelized onions are literally soggy slightly saut√©ed red onions.

This literally looks like the cheap pizzas you get wrapped in plastic in cheap grocery store. Wouldn‚Äôt be surprised if they just resold those, this was 21$ before taxes and delivery.
This place makes Delissio like ‚ÄúThe Godfather‚Äù to this place. Uber eats driver was nice though.

detailedReviews.author: Jake Kittrell
detailedReviews.text: Very tasty pizza, but bread sticks were a little hard, And had a long wait.

detailedReviews.author: TI HS (Ti)
detailedReviews.text: Great food, some of the best pizza around, always fresh and hot when delivered and the delivery people are great. People always have trouble finding my building and getting through but they don't. Everyone is customer-oriented which just adds to the experience.

detailedReviews.author: Johnny Christian, Jr.
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic food and awesome service. Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Dharma George
detailedReviews.text: I almost never leave online reviews. Although I always use Google reviews when picking new places. We‚Äôve been trying many of the local pizza shops for a while now trying to find one the whole family liked. Surprised that it took us this long to stumble upon Pizza Pie Me. We‚Äôve ordered there multiple times and the pizza is always great, the owners and staff friendly, and the service/delivery quick. This is our go-to - give them a try!

detailedReviews.author: D P
detailedReviews.text: This place has some good pizza. Let me begin with the friendly staff. I believe it is a Mom and Pop shop. It's a small pizza place that packs a lot flavor. These local shops know how to put do many of the franchised businesses. The pizza had some great texture. It was like a firm soft. It was not doughy and it was not salty either. Nothing overpowered the other ingredients. You can taste the ingredients as it hit your taste buds. Also, fulfilling. I will recommend. It is within walking distance from a mini Mart and what looks to be a park as well. It is open late so enjoy some good pizza in the late night.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.1/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the fast delivery service, even during peak times, which enhances convenience and satisfaction. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this

The use of fresh, high-quality ingredients in pizzas and other menu items is frequently highlighted by customers, contributing to the restaurant's reputation for delicious food. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The friendly and welcoming service provided by the staff, particularly the owner, creates a "homie" feel that customers appreciate. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and incorrect orders - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Competition and discovery issues - SEO services can solve this visibility issue

positive.author: Mary Wigginton
positive.text: I discovered Pizza Pie Me a few months ago, and it's now my favorite pizza place. Delicious pies, really fresh ingredients, and fast service.

positive.author: Eliezer Martinez
positive.text: Never been to that area so it looked sketchy at first. The place is not truly a sit-down kind of place so we ordered to go. We tried their Italiano pie and it was dioicous. The lady behind the counter was very friendly and quite honestly the price wasn't bad. Pleasantly surprised.

neutral.author: Zuri Johnson
neutral.text: I called 2 times they don‚Äôt answer

neutral.author: Alfonso S.
neutral.text:
The service was good. The older gentleman at the front was very friendly. Pizza was delicious, not cheap with the cheese, which I appreciated. Highly recommend.
The wings, on the other hand, seemed to be rushed, so they were a bit burned outside and a but undercooked inside, which gave them a weird burt nasty flavor. Not recommended. Price was not too bad, but I could not eat the wings, so that was a waste. Would eat here again but not get wings for sure.

neutral.author: Ricky Deras
neutral.text: The pizzas are good and sandwiches here are very well sized. It would have 5 stars but the lady at the counter charged me twice for my food and said I hadn‚Äôt paid online.

negative.author: Lahar Parikh
negative.text: I usually never post reviews, but their actions made me. They are such cheap people - We bought food and asked for 3 paper plates and napkins and they charged $3 for that‚Ä¶ never heard of that in my life since it‚Äôs usually given complementary. Do not recommended going - they are so many places nearby that are better. Food wasn‚Äôt worth the $$ either

negative.author: Joni Guerrero
negative.text: So many things went wrong with my order... 1) I ordered a carry-out special 2-topping pizza with pepperoni and jalapenos. They gave me a pizza with just jalapenos and say I ordered "pizza and jalapenos" which doesn't make sense if I picked 2-toppings and it's on the receipt... 2) crazy enough they added the stem of the jalapenos into the pizza.... Is no one paying attention? 3) the customer service is atrocious when I tried to call about the issue, some guy was giving me an attitude and blaming me 4) To top it off, the pizza is tiny (ordered a large) and was ehhhh on taste. The wings are also tiny!!! I forgot to take photos but other customers have taken photos and they are so small with barely any sauce on them

negative.author: Richard Hutchinson
negative.text: Ordered and the delivery said 40 min. It was deliverd to the wrong place. Didn't get it till 1 1/2 hours. They did not even to give a discount on the product. I will not be ordering from them again.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
